homeWelcome: Welcome to the IVC KPI management and evaluation system. The application supports managing objectives, performance evaluation, approval, and feedback for each individual, department, and the whole company.
kpiProcessStatsDescription: View details of pending, approved/rejected KPIs, average approval time, and highlighted KPIs.
noAwaitingApprovalData: No data available for awaiting approvals.
noChartData: No data available to render the chart.
userActivityStatsDescription: Analyze user and department activities in the system (for Admin/Manager).
topPendingApprovers: Top Approvers/Departments with Most Pending KPIs
noPendingKpiDetails: No pending KPI details available or all have been processed.
noPendingApproversData: No data available for pending approvers/departments.
setRecentKpisLimit: To view detailed submitted KPIs, please set 'Recent KPIs Limit' greater than 0.
noKpiSubmissionData: No KPI submission data available for the current filters.
kpiPerformanceOverviewDescription: Track total KPIs, achievement rates, KPIs not updated, and performance by role.
employeePerformanceHistoryDescription: View employee performance history, including KPIs, achievements, and updates.
kpiInventoryOverviewDescription: Monitor the quantity and distribution of KPIs and KPI assignments across the system.
totalKpiDefinitionsDescription: The total number of KPI definitions available.
assignmentRemovedForUser: The assignment for user {user} has been removed
assignToDepartmentHelp: Select a department to assign the KPI.
assignToSectionsHelp: Select sections to assign the KPI.
noKpiPerformanceOverviewData: No KPI performance overview data available.
companyKpiListDesc: List of KPIs created at the company level. You can create, view, and manage KPIs here.
departmentKpiListDesc: List of KPIs created at the department level. You can create, view, and manage KPIs here.
sectionKpiListDesc: List of KPIs created at the section level. You can create, view, and manage KPIs here.
noKpisFoundMessage: No KPIs found matching your criteria.
noKpisFound: No KPIs found matching your criteria.
noKpisForPerspective: No KPIs found for this perspective.
confirmDeleteAssignment: Are you sure to delete assignment for "{name}"?
selectCycleToView: Please select a cycle to view the review.
noDetailedKpiReview: No detailed KPI review from the manager.
enterYourFeedback: Enter your feedback for this review:
feedbackPlaceholder: Your opinion, explanation, or improvement plan...
reviewCompletedOrReviewed: The review has been reviewed or completed by the manager. No further feedback can be sent.
feedbackAlreadySent: You have already sent feedback. Thank you!
pageNotFoundDescription: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials or try again later.
fetchAverageApprovalTimeError: Failed to fetch average approval time statistics.
userNotFoundOrNotLoggedIn: User information not found or you are not logged in.
selectTargetAndCycle: Please select a target and cycle to start the review.
historyError: An error occurred while loading history.
selectKpiTemplate: Select a KPI to use as template...
targetMustBeNonNegative: Target must be a non-negative number.
accessDeniedDescription: You do not have permission to create KPIs with the current role/scope.
listOfAssignedKpis: List of KPIs assigned to you (User: {user}). Submit your progress updates here.
assignKpiToUsersInSection: Assign KPI to Users in Section
endDateMustBeAfterStartDate: End date must be after start date.
endDateAtLeastOneWeek: End date must be at least one week after start date.
endDateAtLeastOneMonth: End date must be at least one month after start date.
endDateAtLeastOneQuarter: End date must be at least one quarter (3 month) after start date.
endDateAtLeastOneYear: End date must be at least one year after start date.
noSectionUserAssignmentsYet: No user assignments in this section yet
selectDepartmentOrSectionToLoadUsers: Select a department or section to load users.
selectEmployeeToViewObjectives: Select an employee to view objectives
selectReportTypeFirst: Please select a report type first!
employeeFeedbackCompleted: Employee has given feedback. Please confirm completion.
deleteEmployeeErrorDefault: An error occurred while deleting the employee.
saveEmployeeErrorDefault: An error occurred while saving the employee.
enterNewPasswordOrLeaveBlank: Enter new password or leave blank to keep current password
exportExcelNotImplemented: Export to Excel not implemented yet.
searchEmployeePlaceholder: Search employee by name, email, or ID...
deleteEmployeeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this employee?

codeTooltip.title: Code generation guidelines:
codeTooltip.autoGenerate: Code will be auto-generated from formula name

nameTooltip.title: Formula name guidelines:
nameTooltip.rule2: Use letters (including Vietnamese), numbers, and spaces only

validation.nameLength: Formula name must be between 2 and 100 characters
validation.nameFormat: Formula name can only contain letters (including Vietnamese), numbers, spaces and characters: - _ . , ( )
